# Summon Clockwork Mender Swarm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]]) \[[[Lawful Spells|lawful]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, F (a broken metal gear)/DF (a tiny bag and a small candle)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels) 

**Effect:** One summoned creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Monster Manual 4 (WotC), pg. 31

This spell functions like *[[Summon Monster I (Spell)|summon monster I]]*, except that you summon a single clockwork mender swarm. The swarm can be directed to attack opponents, to use its swarm repair ability, and even to use its swarm sacrifice ability.
